name: Entrepreneur
description: You were a budding businessman before the Cataclysm, selling what you claimed was the healthiest water around. Too bad money's worthless now.

name: Rifle Hunter
description: Your buddies knew you as the guy who always wanted to get out in the woods and shoot deer. They mocked you for your trapping and rifle skills. You'd laugh at them now, but they're all dead.

name: Miner
description: You worked in the mines before you immigrated to New England. Even though you couldn't find a job, you kept your pickaxe, flashlight, tool belt, and hardhat. Looks like they'll come in handy.

name: Delinquent
description: You didn't do well in school, and before long you were in Juvy. None of that matters now, though. You managed to steal a purse from a classmate immediately before the cataclysm, and pilfered a dead policeman's gun soon after.

name: Spelunker
description: You always liked going into caves and exploring around, and when the cataclysm hit you were lucky enough to be in the cave.

name: Factory Worker
description: You worked in the factories before the Cataclysm.

name: Cowboy
description: You always wore a 10-Gallon hat, and now your trusty revolver might just save you from the zombies.

name: Camper
description: You liked going off by yourself and camping in the woods. The skills you learned in the woods should come in handy.

name: Biggest Fan
description: You were always found in your mom's basement. According to Darwin, you shouldn't have survived. But you did.

name: Bookworm
description: You always had you head in a book. People said that you'd never amount to anything, but all that reading has filled your head with good knowledge. You'll also have plenty of time to read the books you never got around to.

name: Race Car Driver
description: Although you weren't a pro, you always won against the regulars at the local track.

name: Megaman Wannabe
description: You loved the games. You had them all. You even went so far as to have a fusion blaster CBM installed in your arm. And your parents said it was useless, that you'll never get to use it. WHO'S LAUGING NOW, HUH?

name: Middle Aged Person
description: You would be busy having a mid-life crisis, but there's bigger fish to fry now.

name: Mayor
description: You were the town mayor, and although you were never very popular, you didn't have many enemies either. Maybe you could try some anti-zombie legislation.

name: Jogger
description: You loved to run, and with all the zombies around, you'll still get to do it a lot.

name: Cannabis Grower
description: You grew and sold Cannabis before the Cataclysm. Maybe someday you'll find someone willing to buy it.

name: Furry LARPer
description: You were all set to go over to your friend's house and do some LARPing, but now you don't know if you'll ever see him again.

name: Power Plant Worker
description: You worked at the power plants before the Cataclysm, and your skills may come in handy later, assuming you survive first...

name: Bionic Boxer
description: Until you were disqualified from the competition, nobody knew how you always won. Show them that cheaters will prosper!

name: Lieutenant
description: You were all set to take command when the Cataclysm hit. At least you still have your gun and your commanding presence.

name: Improviser
description: You could always find a new application for something, a skill that will no doubt serve you well.

name: Pharmacist
description: Yeah, the Zombies refuse to take their meds too. Maybe you'll find a group of survivors soon...

name: Prototype Android
description: You were the latest and greatest model, and just a few weeks before the final model was set to be in production, the Cataclysm struck.

name: Daredevil
description: You always had to get that rush of adrenaline, and you just couldn't keep away from danger.

name: Assassin
description: You were a hired killer; a master of disguise. You always got the job done. But the day you were told to kill a man near the evac shelter was you lucky day, as that was the day of the Cataclysm

name: Millionaire
description: You were the wealthiest man in town, but not even you could buy your way out of the apocalypse. These damn zombies even stole you Rolls Royce!

name: Bartender
description: You owned a small bar, and you loved your job. Now that your cash flow has stopped, you may begin to take desperate measures. Maybe the zombies like booze...

name: Swordsman
description: Your affinity for the ancient art of sword fighting will serve you well.

name: Homemaker
description: It's not much, but your life of housework may serve you will.

name: Vandal
description: It was early in the morning, and you were preparing to graffiti the evac shelter. At least you're safe for now.

name: Roleplayer
description: Maybe you'll happen across a +5 tommy gun of zombie slaying.

name: Vacationer
description: Dammit! Every time you want to go on vacation something crappy happens! Now you'll never get to the beach! Oh, and they ate your family, but more importantly, YOU'LL NEVER GET TO THE BEACH!

name: Archaeologist
description: Unfortunately, a college education in imprinted rocks will not come in handy during the end of the world. Dammit.

name: Barbarian
description: Where the hell are you?! You were just ready to go after the Amulet of Yendor when you found yourself in this strange evac shelter.

name: Caveman
description: Dug not understand. Dug want Amulet of Yendor. Dug angry at dead-walkers. DUG ANGRY!

name: Healer
description: Where are you? Where are the Dungeons of Doom? And why are there so many zombies around?

name: Knight
description: By the gods! You've never seen this much destruction before. Too bad you still don't have your horse with you.

name: Monk
description: You had trained for years to enter the Dungeons of Doom for Shan Lai Ching, and now you're god-knows-where. Hopefully your training will serve you well.

name: Priest
description: Ummm... methinks the zombies won't listen to your sermon very well. On the other hand... yeek. The other hand... Holy Crap!

name: Rogue
description: Now where the hell are the Dungeons of Doom? Where's the amulet? Where in the world are you? Say, those look a lot like kobold zombies, only less kobold... Crud.

name: Ranger
description: Whoa, these strange bows they have in the future are amazing! I oughta find a way to take it back to my dimension.

name: Samurai
description: Hi-Keeyah!

name: Tourist
description: You'd much rather be touring the dungeons of doom, but it doesn't appear that you'll be able to anytime soon

name: Valkyrie
description: You didn't think that there was anything special about that glowing zombie. This is what you get for not thinking on top of your game

name: Wizard
description: By the dark arts...

name: T-1000
description: Looks like you picked the wrong guy to assasinate at the wrong time.

name: Bionic Guard
description: You beat out the competition with a set of bionic enhancements, making employers practically fall over themeslves to hire you. Equipped with the latest in bionic and security technology, you were prepared to handle any criminal. Unfortunately, your job description didn't include zombies.

name: Average Joe
description: What chance could some normal guy have in this hellhole of a world? Luckily for you, you managed to grab some household items as you fled.

name: Flasher
description: Anytime you try to flash a zombie, he almost eats your brains. It's probably wise to not get close enough to attempt to flash them, anyway.
